nodes.text: Uogo'cor was a planet located within Trax sector, just off the Trax Tube. Its port often serviced the pirates that preyed on the Trax Tube. The name translated from the language of the native Uogo meant "home of the suffering ones".
During the Clone Wars, the planet was located within Separatist space.

A settlement was established on Uogo'cor by the pirate gang, Dark Warbirds. The gang held control of the system for many years, subjugating the native population until the arrival of the Galactic Empire.
The Corellian smuggler Sumok died in a battle over the planet, fighting against an Imperial customs vessel.
The world was overrun by the Yuuzhan Vong shortly after they arrived in Hutt Space.
